title: United Card Service and Citi Announce Partnership Agreement on Acquiring Services for the Bank's Clients in Russia
summary: Moscow - ZAO Citibank and United Card Service (UCS), the largest payment card processing company in Russia and a subsidiary of the US-based Global Payments Inc., announced the signing of an agreement through which Citi will recommend to its clients UCS as an exclusive provider of POS and internet acquiring services in Russia. UCS will provide Citi's clients with the full spectrum of card acceptance services, including the installation and servicing of POS terminals, organization of e-commerce, holding of training seminars and provision of on-going technical support.
tag-1: United Card Service and Citi Announce Partnership Agreement on Acquiring Services for the Bank's Clients in Russia
tag-2: Moscow – ZAO Citibank and United Card Service (UCS), the largest payment card processing company in Russia and a subsidiary of the US-based Global Payments Inc., announced the signing of an agreement through which Citi will recommend to its clients UCS as an exclusive provider of POS and internet acquiring services in Russia. UCS will provide Citi's clients with the full spectrum of card acceptance services, including the installation and servicing of POS terminals, organization of e-commerce, holding of training seminars and provision of on-going technical support.
tag-3: "We are glad to offer our clients the opportunity to use an acquiring service company, which is rightfully considered one of the most qualified suppliers of POS and internet acquiring in Russia," noted Natalia Belaya, Vice President, Head of Cash Management for Citi Russia, Central and Eastern Europe. "Thanks to this agreement, we are able to provide our clients with complex solutions that will meet their growing needs, access to cutting-edge technologies and world experience in payment processing."
tag-4: UCS, which has been operating in the Russian market for more than 20 years, has extensive experience in acquiring services. To date, more than 70 international and Russian banks have fully entrusted UCS with the responsibility of providing acquiring services to their clients.
tag-5: "We believe that this agreement not only corresponds to the interests of Citi's clients but also reflects a certain demand and trend in the payment cards market worldwide, whereby such specialized services as acquiring are transferred by universal banks to independent processing companies. This also means that the process of serving clients takes place in close cooperation and via mutually advantageous rather than competitive interaction between the partner bank and a company such as ours," said Vladimir Komlev, General Director of UCS.
tag-6: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-7: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
tag-8: UCS United Card Service (a Global Payments In?. Company) (UCS) is one of the largest processing companies in Russia, servicing approximately 30% of transactions carried out by holders of international and local payments cards in Russia. The company provides acquiring services for cards of the international payment systems VISA International, MasterCard Worldwide, Union Pay and JCB International and the Russian payment system Zolotaya Korona, as well as local non-bank payment cards of various commerce and service organizations. The company is headquartered in Moscow and has 35 regional offices in cities across Russia.
tag-9: As a fully certified vendor for VISA International and MasterCard Worldwide, USC provides comprehensive card issuing services for its partner banks, including maintenance support for ATMs and bank branch terminals.
